name: 5SIR Facilities Bot
description: Manages 5 SIR facility bookings via telegram bot

SERVICE_ACCOUNT_INFO.description: Google service account JSON public key.

HEROKU_APP_URL.description: Heroku web app URL, include / at the end.

ADMIN_UID_LIST.description: Newline separated list of Telegram user ids with admin rights.

PORT.description: Port for Telegram webhook requests. Acceptable values: 443, 80, 88 or 8443.

COMMANDS_DEFAULT.description: JSON serialised list of bot commands. Format: {'command': 'description'}

COMMANDS_ADMIN.description: JSON serialised list of admin-only commands. Format: {'command': 'description'}
COMMANDS_ADMIN.admin: Make a booking as any user

CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: Username of public telegram channel for logging bookings.

CHANNEL_MUTED.description: Whether log channel updates are delivered silently (bool; case sensitive 'True' evaluates as True, all other values evaluate as False.)
